 Start TCP server. 

```
npm run t
```

Start Web server. 

```
npm run w
```

Send 

```
POST http://localhost:8090/pos
{
  "0": "0100",
  "2": "4761739001010465",
  "3": "000000",
  "4": "000000003500",
  "11": "113905",
  "14": "2512",
  "18": "4111",
  "22": "051",
  "23": "001",
  "25": "00",
  "26": "12",
  "32": "777777",
  "33": "111111111",
  "35": "4761739001010465D25122011172745689",
  "37": "820611123456",
  "41": "00000001",
  "42": "TERMINAL_000001",
  "43": "TERMINAL  Merchant 1 0000000 NAIROBI KE ",
  "49": "404",
  "56": "1510",
  "123": "51010151134C101",
  "127": "000000800000000002247E1E5F7C0000000000000000650000000000000014A000000003101058000058FF004FD579AAB9858C09800280000000000000000010302031F000103024606011203A480000F0300000000000000000000D4BA9766008CE0F8E8404210280008800404180725800006281000898892B"
}
```

OR Curl

```shell
curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:8090/pos \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
  "0": "0100",
  "2": "4761739001010465",
  "3": "000000",
  "4": "000000003500",
  "11": "113905",
  "14": "2512",
  "18": "4111",
  "22": "051",
  "23": "001",
  "25": "00",
  "26": "12",
  "32": "777777",
  "33": "111111111",
  "35": "4761739001010465D25122011172745689",
  "37": "820611123456",
  "41": "00000001",
  "42": "TERMINAL_000001",
  "43": "TERMINAL  Merchant 1 0000000 NAIROBI KE ",
  "49": "404",
  "56": "1510",
  "123": "51010151134C101",
  "127": "000000800000000002247E1E5F7C0000000000000000650000000000000014A000000003101058000058FF004FD579AAB9858C09800280000000000000000010302031F000103024606011203A480000F0300000000000000000000D4BA9766008CE0F8E8404210280008800404180725800006281000898892B"
}'
```

The web server will use the library to encode and send over socket.
